page.title: 07Durweston School:Our Homes 3
page.content: {Bathroom} As we expected every house had only one bathroom. {Toilets Most people have 1 toilet and some people have 2 toilets. However one person had 3 toilets in their house! {Garages Some people haven't got any garages and some people have got 1 garage. {Other Rooms Most people haven't got any other rooms. However 5 people have 1 more and 1 person has 2 more rooms. {First Lived Most people first lived in their house in the 1980's. The rest first lived in them in the 1970's. {Lived Before There are 14 people who have lived in a different house before their present one, and 6 people who haven't.
